name: Tepee3d
short_description: Tepee3D (Tepee is Easy Portable Essential Everywhere) is an application representing a 3D lifespace targeted toward users of any kind of modern digital device. Entirely customizable by the addition of elements or features, Tepee3D is aimed toward casual users as well as developers who can add additional content by using our API prior to sharing their creation. Cross-platform, the project will be available on smartphones (Android, BB10, Tizen, Jolla), tablets and PC (Windows, Linux, Mac OS X) through various distribution platforms such as the Google Play or the BlackBerry World.
